name: @vpursuit/swipl-mcp-server

scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:npx
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build:package && npm run test:npx
scripts.publish:dry-run: npm run publish:prepare && cd dist && npm publish --dry-run
scripts.publish:npm: npm run publish:prepare && cd dist && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && git push origin main && git push --tags && npm run publish:npm && npm run github:release
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && git push origin main && git push --tags && npm run publish:npm && npm run github:release
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && git push origin main && git push --tags && npm run publish:npm && npm run github:release
scripts.release:prerelease: npm run version:prerelease && git push origin main && git push --tags && npm run publish:npm && npm run github:release

author: Peter Trebing
description: SWI-Prolog MCP Server with dual query modes and security layer
